claim: Docker daemon with containerd snapshotter can fail to start with 100% CPU for 1-2 minutes then exit with context deadline exceeded when many images/builds exist
independence_check: Independent - GitHub issue with maintainer responses
notes: Root cause confirmed as BuildKit init timeout

claim: Fix for timeout issue merged in PR #48953 removing buildkit init timeout
Containerd-shim processes can leak during high pod churn in containerd 2.x
Shim leaks occur under high disk I/O due to mount.UnmountAll timeout vs GRPC timeout mismatch
notes: Root cause: 20-30s unmount vs 10s GRPC timeout

claim: nerdctl + containerd can replace docker + dockerd with Docker-compatible CLI
Claude Code PreToolUse hooks can block commands with exit code 2
CLAUDE.md instructions are suggestions that can be deprioritized or pushed out of context window
Docker uses centralized daemon architecture while nerdctl interacts directly with containerd
BuildKit is used by both docker build and nerdctl build behind the scenes
Alias docker to nerdctl is common migration pattern
